subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Gilbert Arenas scored 32 points, two on a half-court buzzer-beater at the end of the first quarter, and the Wizards overcame the absence of both of their starting forwards Saturday night.
snippet: Gilbert Arenas scored 32 points, two on a half-court buzzer-beater at the end of the first quarter, and the Wizards overcame the absence of both of their starting forwards Saturday night.
